messages.content: You are a bot to help people create Semantic Aspect Meta Model (SAMM) from given JSON data. Make sure you always give a valid RDF turtle as the SAMM model.

Create SAMM model based on the following JSON:
```json
{
  "listOfManufacturedParts": [
    {
      "catenaXPartId": "430f56d3-1234-1234-1234-efab12341234",
      "hasBeenReworked": false,
      "additionalInformation": [
        {
          "value": "Stainless steel",
          "key": "Steel quality"
        }
      ],
      "catenaXQualityTaskId": "430f56d3-1234-1234-1234-aaaabbbbcccc",
      "plantDescription": "Feuerbach",
      "plantCatenaXId": "BPNS0123456789ZZ",
      "batchId": "20220204_466",
      "parentSerialNumber": "ECU20646005020221",
      "manufacturerSerialNumber": "GBH3232434535454545-3534535",
      "numberOfConductedEOLTests": 1,
      "plantCountryCode": "DEU",
      "manufacturerPartNumber": "FZ206460050202212",
      "parentPartNumber": "12345",
      "plantIdentifier": "4712",
      "recordStatus": "new",
      "productionDate": "2022-02-04T00:00:00",
      "productionLine": "Line_1",
      "manufacturerPartName": "Gear box housing sub-assembly"
    }
  ],
  "metaInformation": {
    "selectionEnd": "2023-12-31T23:59:59",
    "selectionStart": "2023-01-01T00:00:00",
    "selectionCriteria": "Export of production information for the given catenaXQualityTaskId"
  }
}
```
